extendedInfo.description: Welcome to DoubleTake Offers! The best local-savings app in your pocket. Take, Shop + Share and REDEEM directly from your device thousands of 50% OFF DEALS + FREE LOCAL COUPONS from your favorite businesses around town! Plus, we feature premium VIP mobile offers for many markets, too. Our mission is to put instant savings in your pocket. Need an idea where to eat, play, or shop? Wonder if there's a deal or coupon? Check your DOUBLETAKE OFFERS APP and stretch your dollars nearly every time you go out. Traveling or work out of town? This app is perfect since we offer savings in 29 states and over 750 cities with over 50,000 FREE COUPONS + 1000's of 50% OFF DEALS! You trust the restaurants and merchants we feature where you live, shop and play so you can trust the DOUBLETAKE OFFERS APP to recommend great places (with great deals + coupons) as you take a trip or travel to work. Here are a few great features: - SHOP AND BROWSE for deals + coupons with EZ category options - REDEEM with a quick tap + send to iPhone Passbook - VIEW details, directions + business hours - SHARE your favorites with Social Networking option - FOLLOW your favorite businesses by setting mobile alerts - ACCESS your account and login to connect to your deals + coupons - MANAGE your saved certificates - EXTEND your savings online with DoubleTakeOffers.com Note: PLEASE REMEMBER TO ENABLE YOUR GPS -- Our Keywords: COUPONS COUPON CLIPPER DOUBLETAKE DEALS OFFERS GROUPON COUPON CABIN COUPONCABIN COUPONMOM MOMS RESTUARANTS FOOD SAVINGS DEALS OFFERS COUPONS COUPONCLIPPER.

reviews.title: Wont work at all
reviews.comment: Yup.  Cant view or use coupon unless you create an account which you cant do because keyboard isn\'t initialized.  Stupid worthless app
reviews.author: Paula Benyei

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work...
reviews.comment: Have to create an account to get deals, which you can\'t do because keyboard won\'t work in app....so, you can\'t do anything at all. Sucks!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow or unresponsive
reviews.comment: Great idea, but may have been rolled out too soon. Tap on advertiser and takes forever to respond. Desktop version much better.
reviews.author: John Collins

reviews.title: doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: looks like a good idea....
reviews.author: Katie C

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: Worthless app, cannot enter email
reviews.author: Dawn Evans

reviews.title: Can\'t type
reviews.comment: I can\'t type anything... Keyboard won\'t come up. Wish I could use this app!
reviews.author: Brianna Boyce

reviews.comment: No problems with Samsung S4
reviews.author: Brian McLean

reviews.title: Slowest app ever
reviews.comment: Great platform for.deals if.only would load fast enough
reviews.author: German Fondevila

reviews.title: Useless app
reviews.comment: Loads fine, but there is no way to enter location or email address; tapping on the screen does not bring up the keyboard, and it won\'t even acknowledge the use of the physical keyboard. Totally useless app, unless your desire is to be extremely frustrated. I uninstalled and reinstalled several times with no change, and lost out on the deals I was trying to purchase.
reviews.author: Phoebe Grace

reviews.title: Input missing
reviews.comment: As other user have noted keyboard does not appear for dialog boxes. How could you miss this in testing.
reviews.author: Patrick Hurn

reviews.title: Upgrade sucks
reviews.comment: Can\'t view purchased deals.  Can\'t add location. Previous daily double deal app worked fine. DON\'T UPGRADE!!  useless now.
reviews.author: Nadine M.

reviews.title: Great idea of coupons and deals
reviews.comment: I love the idea of not worrying about my coupons and deals in the magazine! Now  all in one place , my phone! even when I go to Boca Raton!
reviews.author: Jamasb Sokansanj

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Awesome deals
reviews.author: jovon duckson

reviews.title: I love this app!!
reviews.comment: All local coupon. Plus when I go on vacation I can save tons of money in other areas. Love the offers, and love to give as gifts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This has great deals.  I love this app and I don\'t have to print coupons or certificates anymore, they take them right from my phone.
reviews.author: Heather Krukowski

reviews.title: Cannot access, disappointed
reviews.comment: I downloaded the app and when it attempts to find my location, I am then taken to a webpage error screen. I cannot use this app even after uninstalling and reinstalling it. Disappointed!
reviews.author: Holli Stoddart

reviews.title: A awesome savings app!! You need this!
reviews.comment: Almost All of the local coupons that are mailed are now here on one site! I used to have to go to deal site ( double take deals) and then to regular coupon site ( couponclipper) But Now all of them are here nicely organized by business category!! I forgot my Clipper magazine recently at s local restaurant but saved 20% right off my Droid smartphone!! Make sure you download the app specific to your area! This app covers about 36 states!!  Don in Vista CA
reviews.author: Don Dumas

reviews.title: Wow!   What an upgrade
reviews.comment: This is a really nice looking app with a ton of offers   big improvement from the older apps from coupon clipper   nice job,  I\'m using it a lot already here in harrisburg.
reviews.author: Justin Kunder

reviews.title: Broken link
reviews.comment: Installed and goes to an invalid Web page.  Deleted app.  Using android system.
reviews.author: Vernon Cooper

reviews.title: Unable to use on Motorola
reviews.comment: Keyboard will not come up to input information that is required to use the app.
reviews.author: Amy Chapman
